page.title: 06Employment
page.content:
Employment
There are lots of different jobs people can do in Redbridge although there is still some unemployment. Many people work in shops in large shopping centres like Ilford but some of these are closing down because of the high cost of running them. One big local factory is also cutting down on the number of workers it employs. Other people do important work for the council or health services; necessary people such as dustmen and nurses. Nurses especially have to work long hours which has a big effect on their families and home life. A great many people travel outside the area to work, especially to London. This gives a much bigger choice of things you can do.
